column4: I need a runnable (#!) file that uses the command "/usr/local/bin/php -d safe_mode=0 -f FILENAME", but "#! /usr/local/bin/php -d safe_mode=0 -f" doesn't seem to be quite right, it drops me into PHP interactive mode.  What am I doing wrong?
Perhaps try the safe_mode=0 in quotes, or even maybe its ="SAFE_MODE ..."
